title.rendered: Samsung Galaxy J3 2017 UK SIM-Free Smartphone – Black

content.rendered:
Product Description

Samsung J330 J3 2017 Black – Features a 5″ (12.7 cm) show and runs on Android v7.0 (Nougat) working system. The gadget is powered by a Quad core, 1.4 GHz, Cortex A53 processor paired with 2 GB of RAM. As far because the battery is anxious it has 2400 mAh. Over that, so far as the rear digicam is anxious this cell has a 13 MP digicam.

The rear 13MP F1.7 digicam on the Galaxy J5 captures clear images with enhanced element in low mild. Its intuitive interface permits one-handed performance due to its transferring shutter button, so you possibly can nonetheless take the shot whereas adjusting your pose or framing the scene.

The Samsung Galaxy J5 permits you to take shiny and vivid selfies each time. Add extra correct element into each low mild shot due to its entrance LED and selfie flashes. You can even management the shutter with a easy hand gesture.

Keep utilization working at optimum ranges. Thanks to 2 GB of RAM, 16 GB of inner storage and as much as 256 GB of optionally available expandable storage capability with microSD assist, the Samsung Galaxy J5 ensures extremely responsive and blazingly quick speeds to speed up your workflow.

Box Contains

Samsung Galaxy J3 2017 Black 16 GB

Make certain this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
5″ HD PLS show (720 x 1280)
1.4GHz Quad-core processor, 2GB RAM, 16GB expandable reminiscence
13MP rear digicam; 5MP entrance digicam

Android 7.0 Nougat
